description.author: Henning Thielemann and Johannes Waldmann
description.description:
An editor shows a textual description of music (like Haskore),
an interpreter computes and emits a stream of MIDI events,
and (that's the main point) the user can change the program on the fly.
Additionally the state of the interpreter is shown
in the form of the current reduced term
for educational and debugging purposes.

package-flags.name: gui
package-flags.description: Build the wxWidgets GUI for the sequencer

package-flags.name: mplayer
package-flags.description: Build the remote controller to the mplayer

package-flags.name: httpserver
package-flags.description: Enable access to modules via a web browser
